metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13225 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A NULL Pointer Dereference in match_at() in regexec.c in Oniguruma 6.9.2 allows attackers to potentially cause denial of service by providing a crafted regular expression. Oniguruma issues often affect Ruby, as well as common optional libraries for PHP and Rust.

criterions.comment: libonig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
